ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | submmnd.h | |- H = ( M |`s S ) |
| 2 |  | subm0.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` M ) |
| 3 |  | #P_submrcl | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> M e. Mnd ) |
| 4 | 1 | #P_submmnd | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> H e. Mnd ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` M ) = ( Base ` M ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_submss | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> S C_ ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 7 | 2 | #P_subm0cl | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> .0. e. S ) |
| 8 | 5, 2, 1 | #P_submnd0 | |- ( ( ( M e. Mnd /\ H e. Mnd ) /\ ( S C_ ( Base ` M ) /\ .0. e. S ) ) -> .0. = ( 0g ` H ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 4, 6, 7, 8 | #P_syl22anc | |- ( S e. ( SubMnd ` M ) -> .0. = ( 0g ` H ) ) |
